name: raycast-language-tool
title: Language Tool - Spell & Grammar Checker
description: Raycast extension that provides instant spelling and grammar correction using LanguageTool. Type any text, get real-time suggestions, and copy the improved version. Ideal for developers, writers, and anyone who wants fast, high-quality text corrections in multiple languages.
author: lucastaonline

commands.name: check-text
commands.title: Check Text
commands.description: Check a text with LanguageTool for possible style and grammar issues.

commands.name: check-text-instant
commands.title: Check Text Instant
commands.description: Check a text with LanguageTool using the clipboard content and paste the result instantly. The language is detected automatically.

preferences.name: username
preferences.title: Username/Email
preferences.description: Your username or email used to log in at languagetool.org (for Premium access).

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: Your API key from https://languagetool.org/editor/settings/access-tokens (for Premium access).

preferences.name: showAdvancedOptions
preferences.label: Show Advanced Options in Form
preferences.description: Display advanced option fields in the form. Values below are always used when filled, regardless of this setting.

preferences.name: motherTongue
preferences.title: Mother Tongue
preferences.description: Your native language code (e.g., pt-BR, es) for false friends detection.

preferences.name: preferredVariants
preferences.title: Preferred Variants
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of preferred language variants when using auto-detection (e.g., en-GB,de-AT).

preferences.name: level
preferences.title: Check Level
preferences.description: Verification level: empty (default API behavior), 'default' (force standard mode), or 'picky' (stricter checking with additional rules for formal text).

preferences.name: enabledRules
preferences.title: Enabled Rules
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of rule IDs to enable (e.g., RULE_ID_1,RULE_ID_2).

preferences.name: disabledRules
preferences.title: Disabled Rules
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of rule IDs to disable (e.g., WHITESPACE_RULE).

preferences.name: enabledCategories
preferences.title: Enabled Categories
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of category IDs to enable (e.g., GRAMMAR,TYPOS).

preferences.name: disabledCategories
preferences.title: Disabled Categories
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of category IDs to disable (e.g., STYLE).

preferences.name: enabledOnly
preferences.label: Enable Only Specified Rules
preferences.description: If checked, only rules/categories specified in 'Enabled Rules' or 'Enabled Categories' will be active.

preferences.name: enableHiddenRules
preferences.label: Enable Hidden Rules
preferences.description: If checked, enables hidden rules in the API.

preferences.name: noopLanguages
preferences.title: Noop Languages
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of language codes that should not be processed (e.g., pt,en).

preferences.name: abtest
preferences.title: A/B Test
preferences.description: A/B test configuration string for experimental features. To get the best A/B test combination, use the official website https://languagetool.org/ and check the POST request to /check in devtools.

preferences.name: allowIncompleteResults
preferences.label: Allow Incomplete Results
preferences.description: If checked, allows the API to return incomplete results.

preferences.name: useragent
preferences.title: User Agent
preferences.description: User agent configuration for API requests.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
